title: Christmas Music Recommendation: Behold The Lamb of God - Andrew Peterson
description:
Here is a link to the playlist with the newer 2019 version of the album: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLSOArt-wtjbBQCv4lCqowXHQsvrVWv69i

Here is the link to the interview featured in this video: https://youtu.be/zHWOI9BW6Wk
